Wapiti Valley Ski Area located approximately 29 mi north of the City of Melfort offers both downhill skiing on 8 slopes and cross country skiing on 8 trails. 
We also maintain a terrain park for snowboard enthusiasts. 

Click below for Ski Report and Weather Forcast:


Ski Wapiti Valley Web Site
directions: Wapiti is located along Highway #6, 47 kms north of the City of Melfort or 24 kms south of the Town of Choiceland. Approximate driving distance of 225 km from the City of Saskatoon or 125 kms from the City of Prince Albert.
title: Waipiti Valley Ski Resort
